text: Francis Powers (1865–1940) was American silent film actor, writer, and director. Francis Powers may also refer to: * Francis Gary Powers (1929–1977), American U-2 spy plane pilot * Francis J. Powers (1895–1977), American sportswriter * Buddy Powers, collegiate ice hockey player and coach * Francis Fisher Powers, 19th century singing teacher of Ernest Trow Carter * Francis Powers Starkie, father of W. J. M. Starkie
title: Francis Powers (disambiguation)
